Bash(python -c "
import socket
import struct

s = socket.socket\(socket.AF_INET, socket.SOCK_STREAM\)
s.settimeout\(10\)
try:
    s.connect\(\(''168.196.238.158'', 9820\)\)
    # SOCKS5 greeting: version=5, num_methods=1, method=2 \(username/password\)
    s.send\(b''\\x05\\x01\\x02''\)
    resp = s.recv\(2\)
    print\(f''SOCKS5 response: {resp.hex\(\)}''\)
    if resp == b''\\x05\\x02'':
        print\(''Server accepts username/password auth''\)
        # Send auth: version=1, ulen, username, plen, password
        user = b''1J6uVS''
        pwd = b''T78YG1''
        auth = struct.pack\(''B'', 1\) + struct.pack\(''B'', len\(user\)\) + user + struct.pack\(''B'', len\(pwd\)\) + pwd
        s.send\(auth\)
        auth_resp = s.recv\(2\)
        print\(f''Auth response: {auth_resp.hex\(\)}''\)
        if auth_resp[1] == 0:
            print\(''Authentication successful!''\)
        else:
            print\(''Authentication failed''\)
    elif resp == b''\\x05\\x00'':
        print\(''No auth required''\)
    else:
        print\(f''Unknown response: {resp}''\)
except Exception as e:
    print\(f''Error: {e}''\)
finally:
    s.close\(\)
")
